__e: Listen, Anna, I know the rules state that you're supposed to hate Dad's new girlfriend, but I'm really hoping that we can be more original than that and make this work.

We don't know how long it's going to be until she's well enough to talk, so I was hoping, in the meantime, maybe you might like to review original case files and see if there was a link between the two girls.
That would be incredible, I mean... They're so much more unique than the ones I've been shooting with.
It might be better to buy some of those Paris originals, huh?
Over 40 hours of original gameplay.. from the authority of balls to the wall action!
Right after I xeroxed all these and got the originals back to my friend at central.
And when he finally got all the original Ometepe tribe members on his side, he was back in complete control.

With Lex Luthor's help, our Justice League managed to rout them before they could impose their totalitarian will on our populace. I also know what you didn't tell anyone outside of the original seven members of the Justice League. On that other Earth, so very much like our own, a Superman so very much like you killed the president.
I figured you'd say that, too. And I guess it's cool. It's just that, without the money, the studio won't release Haley's masters.
Since you're the last of the original seven and the least well known... could you begin by telling us who was the best pilot you ever saw?
It was the kind of thing of putting himself into a place that most of us won't go, and exploring that space... so that he could receive very, very novel and new ideas.
I'm one of the original souls, and you do not tell me what to do like I'm some kind of drone we found on the street.
